body_html:
@yaroslavvb @alextp

So my gradients are flowing back right before the CNN(FCN) and then i am seeing an unconnected node on my tensorflow graph visualization. Even though the loss has been decreasing i am not able to find anything meaningful on the final output.

Are the gradients still flowing through that node?If not how can i connect the node?
body:
@yaroslavvb @alextp 

So my gradients are flowing back right before the CNN(FCN) and then i am seeing an unconnected node on my tensorflow graph visualization. Even though the loss has been decreasing i am not able to find anything meaningful on the final output.


![step0001](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15856029/37711449-c3f0c416-2d36-11e8-8f43-5b9be2cd3eef.png)

Are the gradients still flowing through that node?If not how can i connect the node?
